net.dempsy.distconfig

Interface PropertiesReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApacheVfsPropertiesReader, ClasspathPropertiesReader, ClusterInfoPropertiesReader

    public interface PropertiesReader
    Implementations of this interface can be used to retrieve a set of properties while optionally registering for updates when properties change.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  PropertiesReader.VersionedProperties
      Stored Properties along with the version number.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PropertiesReader.VersionedProperties read(PropertiesWatcher watcher)
      Retrieves the latest Properties file that's been registered.
      boolean supportsNotification() 

    • Method Detail

      • read

        PropertiesReader.VersionedProperties read(PropertiesWatcher watcher)
                                   throws IOException,
                                          UnsupportedOperationException
        Retrieves the latest Properties file that's been registered.
        Parameters:
        watcher - if non-null the watcher will be called back when the properties change from the version provided. Upon callback the PropertiesWatcher will be unregistered. A subsequent read will need to be called in order to re-register for another change.
        Returns:
        the latest PropertiesReader.VersionedProperties
        Throws:
        IOException - if the underlying transport or storage mechanism throws an IOException
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the underlying implementation doesn't support notification but watcher is not null.

      • supportsNotification

        boolean supportsNotification()
        Returns:
        Whether or not the underlying implementation supports notification.
